scenario_text.value:
This woman just showed up and started talking
to me, and she was holding Miu’s purse.

You’re right, I don’t see her anywhere! Where
is she?!

I don’t know. We stayed together for a while,
then I left for one second and she was gone.

Then this woman comes out of nowhere with
some of Miu’s stuff!

That does seem suspicious, but why call her
a monster in disguise?

Everything we’ve met so far has been
a monster. What makes you think she’s not?

You see? He’s convinced, and I don’t know
what to do.

I only spoke to him because he’s the only
soul I saw nearby.
Don’t tell me you’re buying that bull!

Don’t fall for her tricks! You can’t trust
her.
